subject: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Hi Dear Friend,
How are you today? Hope all is well with you and your family?, You may
not understand why this mail came to you again but if you do not
remember me, you might have received an email from me in the past
regarding my investment proposal for you to act as my investment
partner to receive my funds which we didn't conclude successfully. I
am using this opportunity to inform you that the transaction was
completed with the assistance of another partner Ahmed Hamed Al Subhi
from Uganda whom the bank nominated to finance and conclude the
transaction. I thank you for your great effort to our unfinished
transfer of funds into your account due to one reason or the other
best known to you.
The funds were successfully transferred to my new partner's account
who was capable of assisting me for the transaction and investment
project. Due to your effort, sincerity, courage and trustworthiness
you showed to me in your communication and time spent. I want to
compensate you and to show my gratitude to you with the sum of
US$150,000.00 (One Hundred and Fifty Thousand United States Dollars
only) and the amount was uploaded into an ATM Card in your name, I
was unable to make a direct transfer to your account because i didn't
have your account details, base on that reason, i decided to asked the
bank to upload the amount into an ATM Visa Card in your name.
Meanwhile, I Deposited your ATM Visa Card to the office of the
Attorney, I had authorized him to send the ATM Visa Card to you once
you are in contact with him. Please, accept this offer with good faith
as this is from the bottom of my heart, Also comply with his
directives so that He will send the ATM Visa Card package to you
without any delay. As you are contacting him, you have to send your
information where the ATM Visa Card package will be sent to. so that
it
will be delivered directly to you through DHL or any other available
courier services.
Send the following details:
Full name:
Address:
Country:
Age:
Tel:
Identification
:
Arturo Russell
Email:( 
russellarturo75@yahoo.com
)
Telephone and WhatsApp number
+256 755-425-772
Presently, I am in Dubai with Ahmed Hamed Al Subhi and I'm very busy
here because of some investment projects.  Once you receive the ATM
Visa Card, you are obligated to make a daily withdrawal of $2,000.00
each day from any Automatic Teller Machine attached to any
international bank nearest to you.
So feel free to write an email to Arturo Russell, and tell him to send
your ATM Visa Card to you through DHL or FedEx without any delay and
he will send all the necessary information and documents which you
will need to have access to the funds and kindly inform me as soon as
you receive it.
Take care and remain Blessed.
Sincerely Yours
Mr. Muhammad Aminu

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Hi Mr. Muhammad inu,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I hope you're doing well too. I vaguely remember our previous conversation about your investment proposal. It's interesting to hear that the transfer was completed with the help of another partner. Can you tell me more about this partner, Ahmed Hamed Al Subhi? How did he come to be involved in the process?

I appreciate your gratitude and willingness to compensate me for my efforts. The amount you mentioned, US One Hundred and Fifty Thousand United States Dollars, is quite substantial. However, I'm a bit confused about why the funds were uploaded onto an ATM Card instead of being transferred directly into my account. Could you please explain the reason behind this decision?

You mentioned that I need to contact Arturo Russell regarding the delivery of the ATM Visa Card package. Could you provide me with his contact information? Also, what documents will be included in the package and why are they necessary for accessing the funds?

Lastly, could you clarify if there are any fees or charges associated with receiving and activating the ATM Visa Card? I want to make sure I have all the information before proceeding.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Joseph

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Joseph,

Sequel to the receipt of your email, I have comprehensively taken proper account record of the contents with immense cordial greetings of this day 9th Feb. The above-mentioned date I crave your indulgence by showing due respect bringing this correspondence to you in response to your ATM Visa Card.

Following my inquiry on 9th day of Feb 2024 from DHL Courier Service, I'm sending to you the cost value of delivering your package, According to the DHL Registration Officer, the legal costs of delivering your ATM Visa Card to your address is $95.00 USD and the fee must be paid to the office of the DHL Registration Officer before they can registered your Package for delivery.

I have confirmed that the total cost of both DHL official fees, Delivery cost and stamping fee are stated below,

The payments of the DHL official fees, Delivery cost and stamping fee are compulsory and would be tendered to the DHL office before they can register your package for delivery.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF DHL SERVICE STATED AND REQUIRED PAYMENT OF THE FOLLOWING FEES AND THIS IS A COMPULSORY PAYMENT BEFORE THEY CAN DISPATCH YOUR PACKAGE.

1 DHL official Fee ($20.00 USD)
2 Delivery Fee ($60.00 USD)
3 Stamping Fee ($15.00)
4 Total Fees ($95.00 USD)

The total fees required by DHL before dispatching your package is $95.00 USD.

Furthermore, DHL will not dispatch your package on credit basis, so therefore, the payment of the DHL official fee, Delivery fee and stamping fee must be made before they can deliver your package.

Your urgent response will be appreciated to enable them to provide how you can make payment for your delivery.
Best Regards,
Mr.Arturo Russell.

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Russell,

Thank you for your email and providing me with the details regarding the delivery of my ATM Visa Card. I appreciate your prompt response.

I understand that there are certain fees associated with the delivery process. Could you please provide me with more information about these fees? Specifically, what does the DHL official fee cover? And what is the stamping fee for?

Additionally, could you clarify how I can make the payment for these fees? Is there a preferred method of payment that DHL accepts?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joseph

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Attn:Joseph.
DHL Official fees cover up as an insurance coverage which if the ATM Card is lost along the way without completing to your destination, then the DHL Company will hold a responsibility for refunding the card back to the beneficiary. while the insurance documents need to be stamped by the customs to guarantee a safe dispatch to your home.And you will have to reconfirm to me your above delivery home address including your working telephone number.

Meanwhile.Can you be able to use WorldRemit Money Transfer or Ria Money Transfer or Paypal. To send the money? Then the delivery will commence by tomorrow as soon as you have completed the payment of $95. Then the delivery tracking number will be sent to you to know the arrival Date and time of the card.
Best Regards,
Mr.Arturo Russell.

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Russell,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the DHL Official fees and insurance coverage for the ATM Card delivery. It's good to know that DHL will hold and refund the card if it gets lost during transit.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify what you mean by "completing to your"? Also, why do the insurance documents need to be stamped by customs? Is there a specific reason for this?

Furthermore, I would like to confirm if there are any other charges or fees involved apart from the DHL Official fees and insurance coverage. It's important for me to have a clear understanding of all the costs associated with this delivery.

Regarding payment, I am familiar with PayPal but not so much with Money Transfer or Ria Money Transfer. Could you please provide more details about these payment methods? How secure are they? Are there any additional charges or fees when using them?

Once I have all the necessary information, I will be able to make an informed decision regarding the payment and proceed accordingly.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Joseph

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Russell,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the DHL Official fees and insurance coverage for the ATM Card delivery. It's good to know that there are measures in place to ensure the safe dispatch of the card.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify what exactly the insurance documents are for? How do they guarantee the safe delivery of the card?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the payment options you mentioned. Could you explain how Money Transfer, Ria Money Transfer, and Paypal work in this context? Which one would you recommend?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Joseph

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body: Give me your phone number to call you direct and explain to you everything you may need to hear than asking different question on the email. Because I'm very busy for been close to my email all the time.

subject: Re: Hi Dear Friend,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to explain everything over a phone call. However, I prefer to communicate through email for now. Could you please provide me with more information about what you'd like to discuss? I'm curious to learn more about it.

Best wishes,
Joseph
